name: api_editor_EditorWindow
description: Derive from this class to create a custom Editor window.

properties.name: autoRepaintOnSceneChange
properties.description: Enable this property to automatically repaint the window when the SceneView is modified.

properties.name: dataModeController
properties.description: An instance of IDataModeController to handle DataMode functionalities for the current window.

properties.name: docked
properties.description: Returns true if EditorWindow is docked.

properties.name: EditorWindow
properties.description: Dockarea we're inside.

properties.name: hasFocus
properties.description: Returns true if EditorWindow is focused.

properties.name: hasUnsavedChanges
properties.description: This property specifies whether the Editor prompts the user to save or discard unsaved changes befor

properties.name: maximized
properties.description: Whether or not this window is maximized?

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The maximum size of this window when it is floating or modal. The maximum size is not used when the

properties.name: minSize
properties.description: The minimum size of this window when it is floating or modal. The minimum size is not used when the

properties.name: overlayCanvas
properties.description: The OverlayCanvas for this window.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The desired position of the window in screen space.

properties.name: rootVisualElement
properties.description: Retrieves the root visual element of this window hierarchy.

properties.name: saveChangesMessage
properties.description: The message that displays to the user if they are prompted to save

properties.name: titleContent
properties.description: The GUIContent used for drawing the title of EditorWindows.

properties.name: wantsLessLayoutEvents
properties.description: Specifies whether a layout pass is performed before all user events (for example, EventType.MouseDow

properties.name: wantsMouseEnterLeaveWindow
properties.description: Checks whether MouseEnterWindow and MouseLeaveWindow events are received in the GUI in this Editor w

properties.name: wantsMouseMove
properties.description: Checks whether MouseMove events are received in the GUI in this Editor window.

properties.name: BeginWindows
properties.description: Mark the beginning area of all popup windows.

properties.name: Close
properties.description: Close the editor window.

properties.name: DiscardChanges
properties.description: Discards unsaved changes to the contents of the window.
